Class CollisionEvent

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      CollisionEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class CollisionEvent
extends java.util.EventObject

A semantic event which indicates that a collision has occured.

This event is generated by a component (such as a BrickWall when a collision has been detected. The event is passed to every CollisionListener that registered to receive such events using the component's addCollisionListener method.

See Also:
BrickWall, CollisionListener, Serialized Form

getTarget

public int getTarget()
Gets the target of the collision. The target can be one the following values:
  • CollisionEvent.BRICK
  • CollisionEvent.BAT
  • CollisionEvent.WALL
  • CollisionEvent.MISS

Returns:
the target
